New Records: David Miller remained unbeaten on 59, his highest score in ICC Men's T20 World Cup
Key Match Events: Miller and Stubbs added 65 for the fifth wicket to lift South Africa from 12 for 4
Miller finished the game with a sequence of 2, 0, 4 and 6 in the penultimate over
Pre-Game Insights: South Africa made heavy weather of a modest chase in New York before David Miller and Tristan Stubbs dug deep
Post-Match Reflections: Miller had tamed the demons of Adelaide 2022
Miller and Stubbs take over and lift South Africa from a crisis
Miscellaneous Highlights: The win was set up by the South Africa fast bowlers, who combined to stop Netherlands at 103 for 9
Sybrand Engelbrecht top-scored for Netherlands after walking out at a ricky time
